title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Biology Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational biology concepts and experience with mobile learning devices
context.additional_context: Acquiring and applying strategies to systematically manage cognitive load in mobile-based biology learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four key principles of Cognitive Load Theory (CLT): chunking/pre-training, modality, redundancy, and seductive details
Learners can apply cognitive load minimization strategies with over 80% accuracy when designing biology content for mobile learning environments
Learners can self-assess their learning process using a multimedia learning theory (CTML)-based evaluation tool
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
